00001 // SSHT package to perform spin spherical harmonic transforms

00019 #include <fftw3.h>
00020

00048 void ssht_adjoint_mw_inverse_sov_sym(complex double *flm, 
00049                                      complex double *f, 
00050                                      int L, int spin, 
00051                                      ssht_dl_method_t dl_method,
00052                                      int verbosity) {
00053 
00054   int el, m, mm, ind, t;
00055   int eltmp;
00056   double *sqrt_tbl, *signs;
00057   int el2pel, inds_offset;
00058   int *inds;
00059   double ssign, elfactor;
00060   fftw_plan plan;
00061   complex double *inout;
00062   complex double *Fmt, *Fmm;
00063   int f_stride, Fmt_stride, Fmt_offset, Fmm_stride, Fmm_offset;
00064   double *dl;
00065   double *dl8 = NULL;
00066   int dl_offset, dl_stride;
00067   complex double *expsm, *expsmm;
00068   int exps_offset;
00069   int elmmsign, elssign;
00070   int spinneg;
00071 
00072   // Allocate memory.
00073   sqrt_tbl = (double*)calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(double));
00074   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl)
00075   signs = (double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(double));
00076   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(signs)
00077   expsm = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
00078   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(expsm)
00079   expsmm = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
00080   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(expsmm)
00081   inds = (int*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(int));
00082   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inds)
00083 
00084   // Perform precomputations.
00085   for (el=0; el<=2*(L-1)+1; el++)
00086     sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
00087   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m=m+2) {
00088     signs[m]   =  1.0;
00089     signs[m+1] = -1.0;
00090   }
00091   ssign = signs[abs(spin)];
00092   spinneg = spin <= 0 ? spin : -spin;
00093   exps_offset = L-1;
00094   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++)
00095     expsm[m + exps_offset] = cexp(I*SSHT_PION2*(m+spin));
00096   for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++)
00097     expsmm[mm + exps_offset] = cexp(-I*mm*SSHT_PI/(2.0*L-1.0));
00098 
00099   // Print messages depending on verbosity level.
00100   if (verbosity > 0) {
00101     printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
00102            "Computing adjoint inverse transform using MW sampling with ");
00103     printf("%s%s%d%s%d%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, "parameters  (L,spin,reality) = (", 
00104            L, ",", spin, ", FALSE)");
00105     if (verbosity > 1)
00106       printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
00107              "Using routine ssht_adjoint_mw_inverse_sov_sym...");
00108   }
00109 
00110   // Compute Fourier transform over phi, i.e. compute Fmt.
00111   Fmt = (complex double*)calloc((2*L-1)*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
00112   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmt)
00113   Fmt_stride = 2*L-1;
00114   Fmt_offset = L-1;
00115   f_stride = 2*L-1;
00116   inout = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
00117   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout)
00118   plan = fftw_plan_dft_1d(2*L-1, inout, inout, FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
00119   for (t=0; t<=L-1; t++) {
00120     memcpy(inout, &f[t*f_stride], f_stride*sizeof(double complex));
00121     fftw_execute_dft(plan, inout, inout);
00122     for(m=0; m<=L-1; m++) 
00123       Fmt[(m+Fmt_offset)*Fmt_stride + t] = inout[m];
00124     for(m=-(L-1); m<=-1; m++) 
00125       Fmt[(m+Fmt_offset)*Fmt_stride + t] = inout[m+2*L-1]; 
00126   }
00127 
00128   // Apply adjoint of periodic entension.
00129   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++) 
00130     for (t=L; t<=2*L-2; t++) 
00131       Fmt[(m+Fmt_offset)*Fmt_stride + t] = 0.0;
00132 
00133   // Compute Fourier transform over theta, i.e. compute Fmm.
00134   Fmm = (complex double*)calloc((2*L-1)*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
00135   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmm)
00136   Fmm_stride = 2*L-1;
00137   Fmm_offset = L-1;
00138   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++) {
00139     memcpy(inout, &Fmt[(m+Fmt_offset)*Fmt_stride], Fmt_stride*sizeof(complex double));
00140     fftw_execute_dft(plan, inout, inout);
00141     for(mm=0; mm<=L-1; mm++) 
00142       Fmm[(mm+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset] = 
00143         inout[mm]; 
00144     for(mm=-(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++) 
00145       Fmm[(mm+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset] = 
00146         inout[mm+2*L-1]; 
00147   }
00148   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
00149   free(inout);
00150 
00151   // Apply phase modulation to account for sampling offset.
00152   for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++)
00153     for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++)
00154       Fmm[(mm+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset] *=
00155         expsmm[mm + exps_offset];
00156 
00157   // Compute flm.
00158   dl = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
00159   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl)
00160   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO) {
00161     dl8 = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED);
00162     SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl8)
00163   }
00164   dl_offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
00165   dl_stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);   
00166   inds_offset = L-1;
00167   for (el=0; el<=L-1; el++) {
00168     for (m=-el; m<=el; m++) {
00169       ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind, el, m);
00170       flm[ind] = 0.0;
00171     }
00172   }
00173   for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) {
00174 
00175     // Compute Wigner plane.
00176     switch (dl_method) {
00177 
00178       case SSHT_DL_RISBO:
00179         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
00180           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
00181             ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
00182                                             SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
00183                                             eltmp, sqrt_tbl, signs);
00184           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
00185                                                        dl8, L,
00186                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00187                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
00188                                                        el, 
00189                                                        signs);
00190         }
00191         else {
00192           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
00193                                           SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
00194                                           el, sqrt_tbl, signs);
00195           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
00196                                                        dl8, L,
00197                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00198                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
00199                                                        el, 
00200                                                        signs);
00201         }
00202         break;
00203   
00204       case SSHT_DL_TRAPANI:
00205         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
00206           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
00207             ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
00208                                                 SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00209                                                 eltmp, sqrt_tbl);
00210           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
00211                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00212                                                            el, signs);
00213         }
00214         else {
00215           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
00216                                               SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00217                                               el, sqrt_tbl);
00218           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
00219                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00220                                                            el, signs);  
00221         }
00222         break;
00223 
00224       default:
00225         SSHT_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid dl method") 
00226     }
00227 
00228     // Compute flm.
00229     elfactor = sqrt((double)(2.0*el+1.0)/(4.0*SSHT_PI));
00230     el2pel = el *el + el;    
00231     for (m=-el; m<=el; m++)
00232       inds[m + inds_offset] = el2pel + m; 
00233     elssign = spin <= 0 ? 1.0 : signs[el];
00234 
00235     for (m=-el; m<=-1; m++) {
00236       // mm = 0
00237       ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
00238       flm[ind] +=
00239         ssign 
00240         * elfactor
00241         * expsm[m + exps_offset]
00242         * signs[el] * dl[0*dl_stride - m + dl_offset]
00243         * elssign * dl[0*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
00244         * Fmm[(0+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset];
00245     }
00246     for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
00247       // mm = 0
00248       ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
00249       flm[ind] +=
00250         ssign 
00251         * elfactor
00252         * expsm[m + exps_offset]
00253         * dl[0*dl_stride + m + dl_offset]
00254         * elssign * dl[0*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
00255         * Fmm[(0+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset];
00256     }
00257 
00258     for (mm=1; mm<=el; mm++) {
00259       elmmsign = signs[el] * signs[mm];
00260       elssign = spin <= 0 ? 1.0 : elmmsign;
00261 
00262       for (m=-el; m<=-1; m++) {
00263         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
00264         flm[ind] +=
00265           ssign
00266           * elfactor
00267           * expsm[m + exps_offset]
00268           * elmmsign * dl[mm*dl_stride - m + dl_offset]
00269           * elssign * dl[mm*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
00270           * ( Fmm[(mm+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset]
00271               + signs[-m] * ssign
00272               * Fmm[(-mm+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset]);
00273       }
00274       for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
00275         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
00276         flm[ind] +=
00277           ssign 
00278           * elfactor
00279           * expsm[m + exps_offset]
00280           * dl[mm*dl_stride + m + dl_offset]
00281           * elssign * dl[mm*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
00282           * ( Fmm[(mm+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset]
00283               + signs[m] * ssign
00284               * Fmm[(-mm+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset]);
00285       }
00286 
00287     }  
00288 
00289   }
00290 
00291   // Free memory.
00292   free(dl);
00293   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO)
00294     free(dl8);
00295   free(Fmt);
00296   free(Fmm);
00297   free(sqrt_tbl);
00298   free(signs);
00299   free(expsm);
00300   free(expsmm);
00301   free(inds);
00302 
00303   // Print finished if verbosity set.
00304   if (verbosity > 0) 
00305     printf("%s%s", SSHT_PROMPT, "Adjoint inverse transform computed!");  
00306 
00307 }

00325 void ssht_adjoint_mw_inverse_sov_sym_real(complex double *flm, 
00326                                           double *f, 
00327                                           int L,
00328                                           ssht_dl_method_t dl_method, 
00329                                           int verbosity) {
00330 
00331   int el, m, mm, ind, ind_nm, t;
00332   int eltmp;
00333   double *sqrt_tbl, *signs;
00334   int el2pel, inds_offset;
00335   int *inds;
00336   double ssign, elfactor;
00337   fftw_plan plan;
00338   double *in_real;
00339   complex double *inout, *out;
00340   complex double *Fmt, *Fmm;
00341   int f_stride, Fmt_stride, Fmt_offset, Fmm_stride, Fmm_offset;
00342   double *dl;
00343   double *dl8 = NULL;
00344   int dl_offset, dl_stride;
00345   complex double *expsm, *expsmm;
00346   int exps_offset;
00347   int elmmsign, elssign;
00348   int spinneg;
00349   int spin = 0;
00350 
00351   // Allocate memory.
00352   sqrt_tbl = (double*)calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(double));
00353   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl)
00354   signs = (double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(double));
00355   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(signs)
00356   expsm = (complex double*)calloc(L, sizeof(complex double));
00357   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(expsm)
00358   expsmm = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
00359   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(expsmm)
00360   inds = (int*)calloc(L, sizeof(int));
00361   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inds)
00362 
00363   // Perform precomputations.
00364   for (el=0; el<=2*(L-1)+1; el++)
00365     sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
00366   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m=m+2) {
00367     signs[m]   =  1.0;
00368     signs[m+1] = -1.0;
00369   }
00370   ssign = signs[abs(spin)];
00371   spinneg = spin <= 0 ? spin : -spin;
00372   exps_offset = L-1;
00373   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++)
00374     expsm[m] = cexp(I*SSHT_PION2*(m+spin));
00375   for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++)
00376     expsmm[mm + exps_offset] = cexp(-I*mm*SSHT_PI/(2.0*L-1.0));
00377 
00378   // Print messages depending on verbosity level.
00379   if (verbosity > 0) {
00380     printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
00381            "Computing adjoint inverse transform using MW sampling with ");
00382     printf("%s%s%d%s%d%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, "parameters  (L,spin,reality) = (", 
00383            L, ",", spin, ", TRUE)");
00384     if (verbosity > 1)
00385       printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
00386              "Using routine ssht_adjoint_mw_inverse_sov_sym_real...");
00387   }
00388 
00389   // Compute Fourier transform over phi, i.e. compute Fmt.
00390   Fmt = (complex double*)calloc(L*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
00391   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmt)
00392   Fmt_stride = 2*L-1;
00393   Fmt_offset = L-1;
00394   f_stride = 2*L-1;
00395   in_real = (double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(double));
00396   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(in_real)
00397   out = (complex double*)calloc(L, sizeof(complex double));
00398   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(out)
00399   plan = fftw_plan_dft_r2c_1d(2*L-1, in_real, out, FFTW_MEASURE);
00400   for (t=0; t<=L-1; t++) {
00401     memcpy(in_real, &f[t*f_stride], f_stride*sizeof(double));
00402         fftw_execute_dft_r2c(plan, in_real, out);
00403     for(m=0; m<=L-1; m++) 
00404       Fmt[m*Fmt_stride + t] = out[m];
00405   }
00406   free(in_real);
00407   free(out);
00408   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
00409 
00410   // Apply adjoint of periodic extension.
00411   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++) 
00412     for (t=L; t<=2*L-2; t++) 
00413       Fmt[m*Fmt_stride + t] = 0.0;
00414 
00415   // Compute Fourier transform over theta, i.e. compute Fmm.
00416   Fmm = (complex double*)calloc((2*L-1)*L, sizeof(complex double));
00417   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmm)
00418   Fmm_stride = L;
00419   Fmm_offset = L-1;
00420   inout = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
00421   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout)
00422   plan = fftw_plan_dft_1d(2*L-1, inout, inout, FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
00423   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++) {
00424     memcpy(inout, &Fmt[m*Fmt_stride], Fmt_stride*sizeof(complex double));
00425     fftw_execute_dft(plan, inout, inout);
00426     for(mm=0; mm<=L-1; mm++) 
00427       Fmm[(mm+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m] = 
00428         inout[mm]; 
00429     for(mm=-(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++) 
00430       Fmm[(mm+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m] = 
00431         inout[mm+2*L-1]; 
00432   }
00433   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
00434   free(inout);
00435 
00436   // Apply phase modulation to account for sampling offset.
00437   for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++)
00438     for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++)
00439       Fmm[(mm+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m] *= 
00440         expsmm[mm + exps_offset];
00441 
00442   // Compute flm.
00443   dl = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
00444   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl)
00445   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO) {
00446     dl8 = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED);
00447     SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl8)
00448   }
00449   dl_offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
00450   dl_stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER); 
00451   inds_offset = 0;
00452   for (el=0; el<=L-1; el++) {
00453     for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
00454       ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind, el, m);
00455       flm[ind] = 0.0;
00456     }
00457   }
00458   for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) {
00459 
00460     // Compute Wigner plane.
00461     switch (dl_method) {
00462 
00463       case SSHT_DL_RISBO:
00464         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
00465           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
00466             ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
00467                                             SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
00468                                             eltmp, sqrt_tbl, signs);
00469           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
00470                                                        dl8, L,
00471                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00472                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
00473                                                        el, 
00474                                                        signs);
00475         }
00476         else {
00477           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
00478                                           SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
00479                                           el, sqrt_tbl, signs);
00480           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
00481                                                        dl8, L,
00482                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00483                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
00484                                                        el, 
00485                                                        signs);
00486         }
00487         break;
00488   
00489       case SSHT_DL_TRAPANI:
00490         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
00491           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
00492             ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
00493                                                 SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00494                                                 eltmp, sqrt_tbl);
00495           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
00496                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00497                                                            el, signs);
00498         }
00499         else {
00500           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
00501                                               SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00502                                               el, sqrt_tbl);
00503           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
00504                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00505                                                            el, signs);  
00506         }
00507         break;
00508 
00509       default:
00510         SSHT_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid dl method") 
00511     }
00512 
00513 
00514     // Compute flm.
00515     elfactor = sqrt((double)(2.0*el+1.0)/(4.0*SSHT_PI));
00516     el2pel = el *el + el;    
00517     for (m=0; m<=el; m++)
00518       inds[m + inds_offset] = el2pel + m; 
00519     elssign = spin <= 0 ? 1.0 : signs[el];
00520 
00521     for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
00522       // mm = 0
00523       ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
00524       flm[ind] +=
00525         ssign 
00526         * elfactor
00527         * expsm[m]
00528         * dl[0*dl_stride + m + dl_offset]
00529         * elssign * dl[0*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
00530         * Fmm[(0+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m];
00531     }
00532 
00533     for (mm=1; mm<=el; mm++) {
00534       elmmsign = signs[el] * signs[mm];
00535       elssign = spin <= 0 ? 1.0 : elmmsign;
00536 
00537       for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
00538         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
00539         flm[ind] +=
00540           ssign 
00541           * elfactor
00542           * expsm[m]
00543           * dl[mm*dl_stride + m + dl_offset]
00544           * elssign * dl[mm*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
00545           * ( Fmm[(mm+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m]
00546               + signs[m] * ssign
00547               * Fmm[(-mm+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m]);
00548       }
00549 
00550     }  
00551 
00552   }
00553 
00554   // Set flm values for negative m using conjugate symmetry.
00555   for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) {
00556     for (m=1; m<=el; m++) {
00557       ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind, el, m);
00558       ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind_nm, el, -m);
00559       flm[ind_nm] = signs[m] * conj(flm[ind]);
00560     }
00561   }
00562 
00563   // Free memory.
00564   free(dl);
00565   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO)
00566     free(dl8);
00567   free(Fmt);
00568   free(Fmm);
00569   free(sqrt_tbl);
00570   free(signs); 
00571   free(expsm);
00572   free(expsmm);
00573   free(inds);
00574 
00575   // Print finished if verbosity set.
00576   if (verbosity > 0) 
00577     printf("%s%s", SSHT_PROMPT, "Adjoint inverse transform computed!");  
00578 
00579 }
00580 
00581 
00598 void ssht_adjoint_mw_forward_sov_sym(complex double *f, complex double *flm,
00599                                      int L, int spin,
00600                                      ssht_dl_method_t dl_method,
00601                                      int verbosity) {
00602 
00603   int el, m, mm, ind;
00604   int eltmp;
00605   double *sqrt_tbl, *signs;
00606   int el2pel, inds_offset;
00607   int *inds;
00608   double ssign, elfactor;
00609   complex double mmfactor;
00610   double *dl;
00611   double *dl8 = NULL;
00612   int dl_offset, dl_stride;
00613   complex double *exps;
00614   int exps_offset;
00615   double elmmsign, elssign;
00616   int spinneg;
00617   complex double *Fmm;
00618   int Fmm_offset, Fmm_stride; 
00619 
00620   fftw_plan plan, plan_bwd, plan_fwd;
00621   complex double *Ftm, *Gmm;
00622   complex double *w, *wr;
00623   int w_offset;
00624   complex double *Fmm_pad, *tmp_pad;
00625   int f_stride, Ftm_stride, Ftm_offset;
00626   int r, t, p;
00627   complex double *inout;
00628 
00629   // Allocate memory.
00630   sqrt_tbl = (double*)calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(double));
00631   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl)
00632   signs = (double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(double));
00633   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(signs)
00634   exps = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
00635   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(exps)
00636   inds = (int*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(int));
00637   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inds)
00638 
00639   // Perform precomputations.
00640   for (el=0; el<=2*(L-1)+1; el++)
00641     sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
00642   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m=m+2) {
00643     signs[m]   =  1.0;
00644     signs[m+1] = -1.0;
00645   }
00646   ssign = signs[abs(spin)];
00647   spinneg = spin <= 0 ? spin : -spin;
00648   exps_offset = L-1;
00649   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++)
00650     exps[m + exps_offset] = cexp(-I*SSHT_PION2*(m+spin));
00651 
00652   // Print messages depending on verbosity level.
00653   if (verbosity > 0) {
00654     printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT,
00655            "Computing adjoint forward transform using MW sampling with ");
00656     printf("%s%s%d%s%d%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, "parameters  (L,spin,reality) = (",
00657            L, ",", spin, ", FALSE)");
00658     if (verbosity > 1)
00659       printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT,
00660              "Using routine ssht_adjoint_mw_forward_sov_sym...");
00661   }
00662 
00663   // Compute Fmm.
00664   Fmm = (complex double*)calloc((2*L-1)*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
00665   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmm)
00666   Fmm_offset = L-1;
00667   Fmm_stride = 2*L-1;
00668   dl = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
00669   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl)
00670   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO) {
00671     dl8 = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED);
00672     SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl8)
00673   }
00674   dl_offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
00675   dl_stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
00676   inds_offset = L-1;
00677   for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) {
00678 
00679     // Compute Wigner plane.
00680     switch (dl_method) {
00681 
00682       case SSHT_DL_RISBO:
00683         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
00684           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
00685             ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L,
00686                                             SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
00687                                             eltmp, sqrt_tbl, signs);
00688           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl,
00689                                                        dl8, L,
00690                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00691                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
00692                                                        el,
00693                                                        signs);
00694         }
00695         else {
00696           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L,
00697                                           SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
00698                                           el, sqrt_tbl, signs);
00699           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl,
00700                                                        dl8, L,
00701                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00702                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
00703                                                        el,
00704                                                        signs);
00705         }
00706         break;
00707   
00708       case SSHT_DL_TRAPANI:
00709         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
00710           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
00711             ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
00712                                                 SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00713                                                 eltmp, sqrt_tbl);
00714           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
00715                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00716                                                            el, signs);
00717         }
00718         else {
00719           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
00720                                               SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00721                                               el, sqrt_tbl);
00722           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
00723                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00724                                                            el, signs);
00725         }
00726         break;
00727 
00728       default:
00729         SSHT_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid dl method")
00730     }
00731 
00732     // Compute Fmm.
00733     elfactor = sqrt((double)(2.0*el+1.0)/(4.0*SSHT_PI));
00734     el2pel = el *el + el;
00735     for (m=-el; m<=el; m++)
00736       inds[m + inds_offset] = el2pel + m;
00737     for (mm=0; mm<=el; mm++) {
00738       elmmsign = signs[el] * signs[mm];
00739       elssign = spin <= 0 ? 1.0 : elmmsign;
00740 
00741       for (m=-el; m<=-1; m++) {
00742         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
00743         Fmm[(m + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset] +=
00744           ssign
00745           * elfactor
00746           * exps[m + exps_offset]
00747           * elmmsign * dl[mm*dl_stride - m + dl_offset]
00748           * elssign * dl[mm*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
00749           * flm[ind];
00750       }
00751       for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
00752         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
00753         Fmm[(m + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset] +=
00754           ssign
00755           * elfactor
00756           * exps[m + exps_offset]
00757           * dl[mm*dl_stride + m + dl_offset]
00758           * elssign * dl[mm*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
00759           * flm[ind];
00760       }
00761 
00762     }
00763 
00764   }
00765 
00766   // Free dl memory.
00767   free(dl);
00768   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO)
00769     free(dl8);
00770 
00771   // Use symmetry to compute Fmm for negative mm.
00772   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++)
00773     for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
00774       Fmm[(m + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset] =
00775         signs[abs(m)] * ssign
00776         * Fmm[(m + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride - mm + Fmm_offset];
00777 
00778   // Compute weights.
00779   w = (double complex*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
00780   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(w)
00781   w_offset = 2*(L-1);
00782   for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=2*(L-1); mm++)
00783     w[mm+w_offset] = ssht_sampling_weight_mw(mm);
00784 
00785   // Compute IFFT of w to give wr.
00786   wr = (double complex*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
00787   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(wr)
00788   inout = (complex double*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
00789   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout)
00790   plan_bwd = fftw_plan_dft_1d(4*L-3, inout, inout, FFTW_BACKWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
00791   plan_fwd = fftw_plan_dft_1d(4*L-3, inout, inout, FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
00792   for (mm=1; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
00793     inout[mm + w_offset] = w[mm - 2*(L-1) - 1 + w_offset];
00794   for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=0; mm++)
00795     inout[mm + w_offset] = w[mm + 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
00796   fftw_execute_dft(plan_bwd, inout, inout);
00797   for (mm=0; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
00798     wr[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm - 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
00799   for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
00800     wr[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm + 2*(L-1) + 1 + w_offset];
00801 
00802   // Compute Gmm by convolution implemented as product in real space.
00803   Fmm_pad = (complex double*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
00804   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmm_pad)
00805   tmp_pad = (complex double*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
00806   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(tmp_pad)
00807   Gmm = (complex double*)calloc((2*L-1)*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
00808   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Gmm)
00809   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++) {
00810 
00811     // Zero-pad Fmm.
00812     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-L; mm++)
00813       Fmm_pad[mm+w_offset] = 0.0;
00814     for (mm=L; mm<=2*(L-1); mm++)
00815       Fmm_pad[mm+w_offset] = 0.0;
00816     for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++)
00817       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] =
00818         Fmm[(m+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset];
00819 
00820     // Compute IFFT of Fmm.
00821     for (mm=1; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
00822       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm - 2*(L-1) - 1 + w_offset];
00823     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=0; mm++)
00824       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm + 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
00825     fftw_execute_dft(plan_bwd, inout, inout);
00826     for (mm=0; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
00827       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm - 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
00828     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
00829       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm + 2*(L-1) + 1 + w_offset];
00830 
00831     // Compute product of Fmm and weight in real space.
00832     for (r=-2*(L-1); r<=2*(L-1); r++)
00833       Fmm_pad[r + w_offset] *= wr[-r + w_offset];
00834 
00835     // Compute Gmm by FFT.
00836     for (mm=1; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
00837       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm - 2*(L-1) - 1 + w_offset];
00838     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=0; mm++)
00839       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm + 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
00840     fftw_execute_dft(plan_fwd, inout, inout);
00841     for (mm=0; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
00842       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm - 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
00843     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
00844       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm + 2*(L-1) + 1 + w_offset];
00845 
00846     // Extract section of Gmm of interest.
00847     for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++)
00848       Gmm[(m+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset] =
00849         Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] * 2.0 * SSHT_PI / (4.0*L-3.0);
00850 
00851   }
00852   fftw_destroy_plan(plan_bwd);
00853   fftw_destroy_plan(plan_fwd);
00854   free(inout);
00855 
00856   // Apply phase modulation to account for sampling offset.
00857   for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++) {
00858     mmfactor = cexp(I*mm*SSHT_PI/(2.0*L-1.0));
00859     for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++)
00860       Gmm[(m + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset] *=
00861         mmfactor;
00862   }
00863 
00864   // Compute Fourier transform over theta.
00865   inout = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
00866   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout)
00867   plan = fftw_plan_dft_1d(2*L-1, inout, inout, FFTW_BACKWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
00868   Ftm = (complex double*)calloc((2*L-1)*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
00869   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Ftm)
00870   Ftm_stride = 2*L-1;
00871   Ftm_offset = L-1;
00872   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++) {
00873 
00874     for(mm=0; mm<=L-1; mm++)
00875       inout[mm] = Gmm[(m+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset];
00876     for(mm=-(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
00877       inout[mm+2*L-1] = Gmm[(m+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset];
00878     fftw_execute_dft(plan, inout, inout);
00879 
00880     for(t=0; t<=2*L-2; t++)
00881       Ftm[t*Ftm_stride + m + Ftm_offset] = inout[t] / (2.0*L-1.0);
00882 
00883   }
00884 
00885   // Adjoint of periodic extension of Ftm.
00886   for(t=0; t<=L-2; t++)
00887     for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++)
00888       Ftm[t*Ftm_stride + m + Ftm_offset] = 
00889         Ftm[t*Ftm_stride + m + Ftm_offset] 
00890         + signs[abs(m)] * ssign * Ftm[(2*L-2-t)*Ftm_stride + m + Ftm_offset];
00891 
00892   // Compute Fourier transform over phi.
00893   f_stride = 2*L-1;
00894   for(t=0; t<=L-1; t++) {
00895 
00896     for(m=0; m<=L-1; m++)
00897       inout[m] = Ftm[t*Ftm_stride + m + Ftm_offset];
00898     for(m=-(L-1); m<=-1; m++)
00899       inout[m+2*L-1] = Ftm[t*Ftm_stride + m + Ftm_offset];
00900     fftw_execute_dft(plan, inout, inout);
00901 
00902     for(p=0; p<=2*L-2; p++)
00903       f[t*f_stride + p] = inout[p] / (2.0*L-1.0);
00904 
00905   }
00906   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
00907   free(inout);
00908 
00909   // Free memory.
00910   free(Fmm);
00911   free(Ftm);
00912   free(w);
00913   free(wr);
00914   free(Fmm_pad);
00915   free(tmp_pad);
00916   free(Gmm);
00917 
00918   // Free precomputation memory.
00919   free(sqrt_tbl);
00920   free(signs);
00921   free(exps);
00922   free(inds);
00923 
00924   // Print finished if verbosity set.
00925   if (verbosity > 0)
00926     printf("%s%s", SSHT_PROMPT, "Adjoint forward transform computed!");
00927 
00928 }
00929 
00930 
00947 void ssht_adjoint_mw_forward_sov_sym_real(double *f, 
00948                                           complex double *flm,
00949                                           int L,
00950                                           ssht_dl_method_t dl_method,
00951                                           int verbosity) {
00952 
00953   int el, m, mm, ind;
00954   int eltmp;
00955   double *sqrt_tbl, *signs;
00956   int el2pel, inds_offset;
00957   int *inds;
00958   double ssign, elfactor;
00959   complex double mmfactor;
00960   double *dl;
00961   double *dl8 = NULL;
00962   int dl_offset, dl_stride;
00963   complex double *exps;
00964   int exps_offset;
00965   double elmmsign, elssign;
00966   int spinneg;
00967   complex double *Fmm;
00968   int Fmm_offset, Fmm_stride;
00969 
00970   fftw_plan plan, plan_bwd, plan_fwd;
00971   complex double *Ftm, *Gmm;
00972   complex double *w, *wr;
00973   int w_offset;
00974   complex double *Fmm_pad, *tmp_pad;
00975   int f_stride, Ftm_stride;
00976   int r, t, p;
00977   complex double *inout;
00978   complex double *in;
00979   double *out_real;
00980   int Gmm_stride;
00981   int spin = 0;
00982 
00983   // Allocate memory.
00984   sqrt_tbl = (double*)calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(double));
00985   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl)
00986   signs = (double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(double));
00987   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(signs)
00988   exps = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
00989   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(exps)
00990   inds = (int*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(int));
00991   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inds)
00992 
00993   // Perform precomputations.
00994   for (el=0; el<=2*(L-1)+1; el++)
00995     sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
00996   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m=m+2) {
00997     signs[m]   =  1.0;
00998     signs[m+1] = -1.0;
00999   }
01000   ssign = signs[abs(spin)];
01001   spinneg = spin <= 0 ? spin : -spin;
01002   exps_offset = L-1;
01003   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++)
01004     exps[m + exps_offset] = cexp(-I*SSHT_PION2*(m+spin));
01005 
01006   // Print messages depending on verbosity level.
01007   if (verbosity > 0) {
01008     printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT,
01009            "Computing adjoint forward transform using MW sampling with ");
01010     printf("%s%s%d%s%d%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, "parameters  (L,spin,reality) = (",
01011            L, ",", spin, ", FALSE)");
01012     if (verbosity > 1)
01013       printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT,
01014              "Using routine ssht_adjoint_mw_forward_sov_sym_real...");
01015   }
01016 
01017   // Compute Fmm.
01018   Fmm = (complex double*)calloc(L*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
01019   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmm)
01020   Fmm_offset = L-1;
01021   Fmm_stride = 2*L-1;    
01022   dl = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
01023   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl)
01024   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO) {
01025     dl8 = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED);
01026     SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl8)
01027   }
01028   dl_offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
01029   dl_stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);   
01030   inds_offset = L-1;
01031   for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) {
01032 
01033     // Compute Wigner plane.
01034     switch (dl_method) {
01035 
01036       case SSHT_DL_RISBO:
01037         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
01038           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
01039             ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
01040                                             SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
01041                                             eltmp, sqrt_tbl, signs);
01042           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
01043                                                        dl8, L,
01044                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01045                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
01046                                                        el, 
01047                                                        signs);
01048         }
01049         else {
01050           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
01051                                           SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
01052                                           el, sqrt_tbl, signs);
01053           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
01054                                                        dl8, L,
01055                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01056                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
01057                                                        el, 
01058                                                        signs);
01059         }
01060         break;
01061   
01062       case SSHT_DL_TRAPANI:
01063         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
01064           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
01065             ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
01066                                                 SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01067                                                 eltmp, sqrt_tbl);
01068           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
01069                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01070                                                            el, signs);
01071         }
01072         else {
01073           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
01074                                               SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01075                                               el, sqrt_tbl);
01076           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
01077                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01078                                                            el, signs);  
01079         }
01080         break;
01081 
01082       default:
01083         SSHT_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid dl method") 
01084     }
01085 
01086     // Compute Fmm.
01087     elfactor = sqrt((double)(2.0*el+1.0)/(4.0*SSHT_PI));
01088     el2pel = el *el + el;    
01089     for (m=0; m<=el; m++)
01090       inds[m + inds_offset] = el2pel + m; 
01091     for (mm=0; mm<=el; mm++) {
01092       elmmsign = signs[el] * signs[mm];
01093       elssign = spin <= 0 ? 1.0 : elmmsign;
01094 
01095       for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
01096         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
01097         Fmm[m*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset] +=
01098           ssign
01099           * elfactor
01100           * exps[m + exps_offset]         
01101           * dl[mm*dl_stride + m + dl_offset]
01102           * elssign * dl[mm*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
01103           * flm[ind];
01104       }
01105 
01106     }
01107 
01108   }
01109 
01110   // Free dl memory.
01111   free(dl);
01112   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO)
01113     free(dl8);
01114 
01115   // Use symmetry to compute Fmm for negative mm.
01116   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++) 
01117     for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++) 
01118       Fmm[m*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset] = 
01119         signs[abs(m)] * ssign 
01120         * Fmm[m*Fmm_stride - mm + Fmm_offset];
01121 
01122   // Compute weights.
01123   w = (double complex*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
01124   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(w)
01125   w_offset = 2*(L-1);
01126   for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=2*(L-1); mm++)
01127     w[mm+w_offset] = ssht_sampling_weight_mw(mm);
01128 
01129   // Compute IFFT of w to give wr.
01130   wr = (double complex*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
01131   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(wr)
01132   inout = (complex double*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
01133   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout)
01134   plan_bwd = fftw_plan_dft_1d(4*L-3, inout, inout, FFTW_BACKWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
01135   plan_fwd = fftw_plan_dft_1d(4*L-3, inout, inout, FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
01136   for (mm=1; mm<=2*L-2; mm++) 
01137     inout[mm + w_offset] = w[mm - 2*(L-1) - 1 + w_offset];
01138   for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=0; mm++) 
01139     inout[mm + w_offset] = w[mm + 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
01140   fftw_execute_dft(plan_bwd, inout, inout);
01141   for (mm=0; mm<=2*L-2; mm++) 
01142     wr[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm - 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
01143   for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++) 
01144     wr[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm + 2*(L-1) + 1 + w_offset];
01145 
01146   // Compute Gmm by convolution implemented as product in real space.
01147   Fmm_pad = (complex double*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
01148   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmm_pad)
01149   tmp_pad = (complex double*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
01150   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(tmp_pad)
01151   Gmm = (complex double*)calloc(L*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
01152   Gmm_stride = 2*L-1;
01153   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Gmm)
01154   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++) {
01155 
01156     // Zero-pad Fmm.
01157     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-L; mm++)
01158       Fmm_pad[mm+w_offset] = 0.0;
01159     for (mm=L; mm<=2*(L-1); mm++)
01160       Fmm_pad[mm+w_offset] = 0.0;
01161     for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++)
01162       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = 
01163         Fmm[m*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset];
01164 
01165     // Compute IFFT of Fmm.
01166     for (mm=1; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
01167       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm - 2*(L-1) - 1 + w_offset];
01168     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=0; mm++)
01169       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm + 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
01170     fftw_execute_dft(plan_bwd, inout, inout);
01171     for (mm=0; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
01172       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm - 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
01173     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
01174       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm + 2*(L-1) + 1 + w_offset];
01175 
01176     // Compute product of Fmm and weight in real space.
01177     for (r=-2*(L-1); r<=2*(L-1); r++) 
01178       Fmm_pad[r + w_offset] *= wr[-r + w_offset];
01179 
01180     // Compute Gmm by FFT.
01181     for (mm=1; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
01182       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm - 2*(L-1) - 1 + w_offset];
01183     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=0; mm++)
01184       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm + 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
01185     fftw_execute_dft(plan_fwd, inout, inout);
01186     for (mm=0; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
01187       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm - 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
01188     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
01189       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm + 2*(L-1) + 1 + w_offset];
01190 
01191     // Extract section of Gmm of interest.
01192     for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++)
01193       Gmm[m*Gmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset] = 
01194         Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] * 2.0 * SSHT_PI / (4.0*L-3.0);
01195 
01196   }
01197   fftw_destroy_plan(plan_bwd);
01198   fftw_destroy_plan(plan_fwd);
01199   free(inout);
01200 
01201   // Apply phase modulation to account for sampling offset.
01202   for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++) {
01203     mmfactor = cexp(I*mm*SSHT_PI/(2.0*L-1.0));
01204     for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++) 
01205       Gmm[m*Gmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset] *= 
01206         mmfactor;
01207   }
01208 
01209   // Compute Fourier transform over theta.
01210   inout = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
01211   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout)
01212   plan = fftw_plan_dft_1d(2*L-1, inout, inout, FFTW_BACKWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
01213   Ftm = (complex double*)calloc((2*L-1)*L, sizeof(complex double));
01214   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Ftm)
01215   Ftm_stride = L;
01216   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++) {
01217 
01218     for(mm=0; mm<=L-1; mm++)
01219       inout[mm] = Gmm[m*Gmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset];
01220     for(mm=-(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
01221       inout[mm+2*L-1] = Gmm[m*Gmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset];
01222     fftw_execute_dft(plan, inout, inout);
01223 
01224     for(t=0; t<=2*L-2; t++)
01225       Ftm[t*Ftm_stride + m] = inout[t] / (2.0*L-1.0);
01226 
01227   }
01228   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
01229   free(inout);
01230 
01231   // Adjoint of periodic extension of Ftm.
01232   for(t=0; t<=L-2; t++)
01233     for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++)
01234       Ftm[t*Ftm_stride + m] =
01235         Ftm[t*Ftm_stride + m]
01236         + signs[abs(m)] * ssign * Ftm[(2*L-2-t)*Ftm_stride + m];
01237 
01238   // Compute Fourier transform over phi.
01239   out_real = (double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(double));
01240   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(out_real)
01241   in = (complex double*)calloc(L, sizeof(complex double));
01242   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(in)
01243   plan = fftw_plan_dft_c2r_1d(2*L-1, in, out_real, FFTW_MEASURE);
01244   f_stride = 2*L-1;
01245   for(t=0; t<=L-1; t++) {
01246     
01247     memcpy(in, &Ftm[t*Ftm_stride], Ftm_stride*sizeof(complex double));
01248     fftw_execute_dft_c2r(plan, in, out_real);
01249 
01250     for(p=0; p<=2*L-2; p++)
01251       f[t*f_stride + p] = out_real[p] / (2.0*L-1.0);
01252 
01253   }
01254   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
01255   free(out_real);
01256   free(in);
01257 
01258   // Free memory.
01259   free(Fmm);
01260   free(Ftm);
01261   free(w);
01262   free(wr);
01263   free(Fmm_pad);
01264   free(tmp_pad);
01265   free(Gmm);
01266 
01267   // Free precomputation memory.
01268   free(sqrt_tbl);
01269   free(signs);
01270   free(exps);
01271   free(inds);
01272 
01273   // Print finished if verbosity set.
01274   if (verbosity > 0)
01275     printf("%s%s", SSHT_PROMPT, "Adjoint forward transform computed!");
01276 
01277 }
01278 
01279 
01280 //============================================================================
01281 // MW South pole interfaces
01282 //============================================================================
01283 
01284 
01305 void ssht_adjoint_mw_forward_sov_sym_pole(complex double *f, 
01306                                           complex double *f_sp, double *phi_sp,
01307                                           complex double *flm, 
01308                                           int L, int spin, 
01309                                           ssht_dl_method_t dl_method,
01310                                           int verbosity) {
01311 
01312   complex double* f_full;
01313   int f_stride = 2*L-1;
01314 
01315   // Allocate full array.
01316   f_full = (complex double*)calloc(L*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
01317   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_full)
01318 
01319   // Perform inverse transform.
01320   ssht_adjoint_mw_forward_sov_sym(f_full, flm, L, spin, 
01321                                   dl_method, verbosity);          
01322 
01323   // Copy output function values, including separate point for South pole.
01324   memcpy(f, f_full, (L-1)*(2*L-1)*sizeof(complex double));
01325   *f_sp = f_full[(L-1)*f_stride + 0];
01326   *phi_sp = ssht_sampling_mw_p2phi(0, L);
01327         
01328   // Free memory.
01329   free(f_full);
01330 
01331 }
01332 
01333 
01351 void ssht_adjoint_mw_forward_sov_sym_real_pole(double *f, 
01352                                                double *f_sp,
01353                                                complex double *flm, 
01354                                                int L, 
01355                                                ssht_dl_method_t dl_method, 
01356                                                int verbosity) {
01357 
01358   double *f_full;
01359   int f_stride = 2*L-1;
01360 
01361   // Allocate full array.
01362   f_full = (double*)calloc(L*(2*L-1), sizeof(double));
01363   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_full)
01364 
01365   // Perform inverse transform.
01366   ssht_adjoint_mw_forward_sov_sym_real(f_full, flm, L, 
01367                                        dl_method, verbosity);
01368 
01369   // Copy output function values, including separate point for South pole.
01370   memcpy(f, f_full, (L-1)*(2*L-1)*sizeof(double));
01371   *f_sp = f_full[(L-1)*f_stride + 0];
01372 
01373   // Free memory.
01374   free(f_full);
01375 
01376 }
01377 
01378 
01399 void ssht_adjoint_mw_inverse_sov_sym_pole(complex double *flm, complex double *f,
01400                                           complex double f_sp, double phi_sp,
01401                                           int L, int spin, 
01402                                           ssht_dl_method_t dl_method,
01403                                           int verbosity) {
01404 
01405   complex double *f_full;
01406   int p, f_stride = 2*L-1;
01407   double phi;
01408 
01409   // Copy function values to full array.
01410   f_full = (complex double*)calloc(L*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
01411   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_full)
01412   memcpy(f_full, f, (L-1)*(2*L-1)*sizeof(complex double));
01413 
01414   // Define South pole for all phi.
01415   for (p=0; p<=2*L-2; p++) {
01416     phi = ssht_sampling_mw_p2phi(p, L);
01417     f_full[(L-1)*f_stride + p] = f_sp * cexp(I*spin*(phi-phi_sp)); 
01418   }
01419 
01420   // Perform forward transform.
01421   ssht_adjoint_mw_inverse_sov_sym(flm, f_full, L, spin, 
01422                                   dl_method, verbosity);
01423 
01424   // Free memory.
01425   free(f_full);
01426 
01427 }
01428 
01429 
01447 void ssht_adjoint_mw_inverse_sov_sym_real_pole(complex double *flm, 
01448                                                double *f, 
01449                                                double f_sp,
01450                                                int L, 
01451                                                ssht_dl_method_t dl_method,
01452                                                int verbosity) {
01453 
01454   double *f_full;
01455   int p, f_stride = 2*L-1;
01456 
01457   // Copy function values to full array.
01458   f_full = (double*)calloc(L*(2*L-1), sizeof(double));
01459   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_full)
01460   memcpy(f_full, f, (L-1)*(2*L-1)*sizeof(double));
01461 
01462   // Define South pole for all phi.
01463   for (p=0; p<=2*L-2; p++)
01464     f_full[(L-1)*f_stride + p] = f_sp; 
01465 
01466   // Perform forward transform.
01467   ssht_adjoint_mw_inverse_sov_sym_real(flm, f_full, L, 
01468                                        dl_method, verbosity);
01469 
01470   // Free memory.
01471   free(f_full);
01472 
01473 }
01474 
01475 
01476 //============================================================================
01477 // MW SS algorithms
01478 //============================================================================
01479 
01480 
01496 void ssht_adjoint_mw_inverse_sov_sym_ss(complex double *flm, complex double *f, 
01497                                         int L, int spin, 
01498                                         ssht_dl_method_t dl_method,
01499                                         int verbosity) {
01500 
01501   int el, m, mm, ind, t;
01502   int eltmp;
01503   double *sqrt_tbl, *signs;
01504   int el2pel, inds_offset;
01505   int *inds;
01506   double ssign, elfactor;
01507   fftw_plan plan;
01508   complex double *inout;
01509   complex double *Fmt, *Fmm;
01510   int f_stride, Fmt_stride, Fmt_offset, Fmm_stride, Fmm_offset;
01511   double *dl;
01512   double *dl8 = NULL;
01513   int dl_offset, dl_stride;
01514   complex double *expsm, *expsmm;
01515   int exps_offset;
01516   int elmmsign, elssign;
01517   int spinneg;
01518 
01519   // Allocate memory.
01520   sqrt_tbl = (double*)calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(double));
01521   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl)
01522   signs = (double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(double));
01523   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(signs)
01524   expsm = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
01525   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(expsm)
01526   expsmm = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
01527   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(expsmm)
01528   inds = (int*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(int));
01529   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inds)
01530 
01531   // Perform precomputations.
01532   for (el=0; el<=2*(L-1)+1; el++)
01533     sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
01534   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m=m+2) {
01535     signs[m]   =  1.0;
01536     signs[m+1] = -1.0;
01537   }
01538   ssign = signs[abs(spin)];
01539   spinneg = spin <= 0 ? spin : -spin;
01540   exps_offset = L-1;
01541   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++)
01542     expsm[m + exps_offset] = cexp(I*SSHT_PION2*(m+spin));
01543   for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++)
01544     expsmm[mm + exps_offset] = cexp(-I*mm*SSHT_PI/(2.0*L-1.0));
01545 
01546   // Print messages depending on verbosity level.
01547   if (verbosity > 0) {
01548     printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
01549            "Computing adjoint inverse transform using MW symmetric sampling with ");
01550     printf("%s%s%d%s%d%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, "parameters  (L,spin,reality) = (", 
01551            L, ",", spin, ", FALSE)");
01552     if (verbosity > 1)
01553       printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
01554              "Using routine ssht_adjoint_mw_inverse_sov_sym_ss...");
01555   }
01556 
01557   // Compute Fourier transform over phi, i.e. compute Fmt.
01558   // Note that t and p indices of fext are increased in size by
01559   // one compared to usual sampling.
01560   Fmt = (complex double*)calloc((2*L)*(2*L), sizeof(complex double));
01561   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmt)
01562   Fmt_stride = 2*L;
01563   Fmt_offset = L-1;
01564   f_stride = 2*L;
01565   inout = (complex double*)calloc(2*L, sizeof(complex double));
01566   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout)
01567   plan = fftw_plan_dft_1d(2*L, inout, inout, FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
01568   for (t=0; t<=L; t++) {
01569     memcpy(inout, &f[t*f_stride], f_stride*sizeof(double complex));
01570     fftw_execute_dft(plan, inout, inout);
01571     for(m=0; m<=L; m++) 
01572       Fmt[(m+Fmt_offset)*Fmt_stride + t] = inout[m]; 
01573     for(m=-(L-1); m<=-1; m++) 
01574       Fmt[(m+Fmt_offset)*Fmt_stride + t] = inout[m+2*L-1+1]; 
01575   }
01576   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
01577   free(inout);
01578 
01579   // Apply adjoint of periodic extension.
01580   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L; m++) 
01581     for (t=L+1; t<=2*L-1; t++) 
01582       Fmt[(m+Fmt_offset)*Fmt_stride + t] = 0.0;
01583 
01584   // Compute Fourier transform over theta, i.e. compute Fmm.
01585   // Note that m and mm indices are increased in size by one.
01586   Fmm = (complex double*)calloc((2*L)*(2*L), sizeof(complex double));
01587   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmm)
01588   Fmm_stride = 2*L;
01589   Fmm_offset = L-1;
01590   inout = (complex double*)calloc(2*L, sizeof(complex double));
01591   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout)
01592   plan = fftw_plan_dft_1d(2*L, inout, inout, FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
01593   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L; m++) {
01594     memcpy(inout, &Fmt[(m+Fmt_offset)*Fmt_stride], Fmt_stride*sizeof(complex double));
01595     fftw_execute_dft(plan, inout, inout);
01596     for(mm=0; mm<=L; mm++) 
01597       Fmm[(mm+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset] = 
01598         inout[mm]; 
01599     for(mm=-(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++) 
01600       Fmm[(mm+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset] = 
01601         inout[mm+2*L-1+1]; 
01602   }
01603   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
01604   free(inout);
01605 
01606   // Compute flm.
01607   dl = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
01608   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl)
01609   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO) {
01610     dl8 = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED);
01611     SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl8)
01612   }
01613   dl_offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
01614   dl_stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER); 
01615   inds_offset = L-1;
01616   for (el=0; el<=L-1; el++) {
01617     for (m=-el; m<=el; m++) {
01618       ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind, el, m);
01619       flm[ind] = 0.0;
01620     }
01621   }
01622   for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) {
01623 
01624     // Compute Wigner plane.
01625     switch (dl_method) {
01626 
01627       case SSHT_DL_RISBO:
01628         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
01629           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
01630             ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
01631                                             SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
01632                                             eltmp, sqrt_tbl, signs);
01633           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
01634                                                        dl8, L,
01635                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01636                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
01637                                                        el, 
01638                                                        signs);
01639         }
01640         else {
01641           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
01642                                           SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
01643                                           el, sqrt_tbl, signs);
01644           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
01645                                                        dl8, L,
01646                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01647                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
01648                                                        el, 
01649                                                        signs);
01650         }
01651         break;
01652   
01653       case SSHT_DL_TRAPANI:
01654         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
01655           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
01656             ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
01657                                                 SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01658                                                 eltmp, sqrt_tbl);
01659           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
01660                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01661                                                            el, signs);
01662         }
01663         else {
01664           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
01665                                               SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01666                                               el, sqrt_tbl);
01667           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
01668                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01669                                                            el, signs);  
01670         }
01671         break;
01672 
01673       default:
01674         SSHT_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid dl method") 
01675     }
01676 
01677     // Compute flm.
01678     elfactor = sqrt((double)(2.0*el+1.0)/(4.0*SSHT_PI));
01679     el2pel = el *el + el;    
01680     for (m=-el; m<=el; m++)
01681       inds[m + inds_offset] = el2pel + m; 
01682     elssign = spin <= 0 ? 1.0 : signs[el];
01683 
01684     for (m=-el; m<=-1; m++) {
01685       // mm = 0
01686       ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
01687       flm[ind] +=
01688         ssign 
01689         * elfactor
01690         * expsm[m + exps_offset]
01691         * signs[el] * dl[0*dl_stride - m + dl_offset]
01692         * elssign * dl[0*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
01693         * Fmm[(0+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset];
01694     }
01695     for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
01696       // mm = 0
01697       ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
01698       flm[ind] +=
01699         ssign 
01700         * elfactor
01701         * expsm[m + exps_offset]
01702         * dl[0*dl_stride + m + dl_offset]
01703         * elssign * dl[0*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
01704         * Fmm[(0+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset];
01705     }
01706 
01707     for (mm=1; mm<=el; mm++) {
01708       elmmsign = signs[el] * signs[mm];
01709       elssign = spin <= 0 ? 1.0 : elmmsign;
01710 
01711       for (m=-el; m<=-1; m++) {
01712         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
01713         flm[ind] +=
01714           ssign
01715           * elfactor
01716           * expsm[m + exps_offset]
01717           * elmmsign * dl[mm*dl_stride - m + dl_offset]
01718           * elssign * dl[mm*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
01719           * ( Fmm[(mm+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset]
01720               + signs[-m] * ssign
01721               * Fmm[(-mm+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset]);
01722       }
01723       for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
01724         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
01725         flm[ind] +=
01726           ssign 
01727           * elfactor
01728           * expsm[m + exps_offset]
01729           * dl[mm*dl_stride + m + dl_offset]
01730           * elssign * dl[mm*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
01731           * ( Fmm[(mm+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset]
01732               + signs[m] * ssign
01733               * Fmm[(-mm+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset]);
01734       }
01735 
01736     }  
01737 
01738   }
01739 
01740   // Free memory.
01741   free(dl);
01742   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO)
01743     free(dl8);
01744   free(Fmt);
01745   free(Fmm);
01746   free(sqrt_tbl);
01747   free(signs); 
01748   free(expsm);
01749   free(expsmm);
01750   free(inds);
01751 
01752   // Print finished if verbosity set.
01753   if (verbosity > 0) 
01754     printf("%s%s", SSHT_PROMPT, "Adjoint inverse transform computed!");  
01755 
01756 }
01757 
01758 
01774 void ssht_adjoint_mw_inverse_sov_sym_ss_real(complex double *flm, double *f, 
01775                                              int L, 
01776                                              ssht_dl_method_t dl_method, 
01777                                              int verbosity) {
01778 
01779   int el, m, mm, ind, ind_nm, t;
01780   int eltmp;
01781   double *sqrt_tbl, *signs;
01782   int el2pel, inds_offset;
01783   int *inds;
01784   double ssign, elfactor;
01785   fftw_plan plan;
01786   double *in_real;
01787   complex double *inout, *out;
01788   complex double *Fmt, *Fmm;
01789   int f_stride, Fmt_stride, Fmt_offset, Fmm_stride, Fmm_offset;
01790   double *dl;
01791   double *dl8 = NULL;
01792   int dl_offset, dl_stride;
01793   complex double *expsm;
01794   int exps_offset;
01795   int elmmsign, elssign;
01796   int spinneg;
01797   int spin = 0;
01798 
01799   // Allocate memory.
01800   sqrt_tbl = (double*)calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(double));
01801   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl)
01802   signs = (double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(double));
01803   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(signs)
01804   expsm = (complex double*)calloc(L, sizeof(complex double));
01805   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(expsm)
01806   inds = (int*)calloc(L, sizeof(int));
01807   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inds)
01808 
01809   // Perform precomputations.
01810   for (el=0; el<=2*(L-1)+1; el++)
01811     sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
01812   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m=m+2) {
01813     signs[m]   =  1.0;
01814     signs[m+1] = -1.0;
01815   }
01816   ssign = signs[abs(spin)];
01817   spinneg = spin <= 0 ? spin : -spin;
01818   exps_offset = L-1;
01819   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++)
01820     expsm[m] = cexp(I*SSHT_PION2*(m+spin));
01821 
01822   // Print messages depending on verbosity level.
01823   if (verbosity > 0) {
01824     printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
01825            "Computing adjoint inverse transform using MW symmetric sampling with ");
01826     printf("%s%s%d%s%d%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, "parameters  (L,spin,reality) = (", 
01827            L, ",", spin, ", TRUE)");
01828     if (verbosity > 1)
01829       printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
01830              "Using routine ssht_adjoint_mw_inverse_sov_sym_ss_real...");
01831   }
01832 
01833   // Compute Fourier transform over phi, i.e. compute Fmt.
01834   // Note that t and p indices of fext are increased in size by
01835   // one compared to usual sampling.
01836   Fmt = (complex double*)calloc((L+1)*(2*L), sizeof(complex double));
01837   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmt)
01838   Fmt_stride = 2*L;
01839   Fmt_offset = L-1;
01840   f_stride = 2*L;
01841   in_real = (double*)calloc(2*L, sizeof(double));
01842   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(in_real)
01843   out = (complex double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(complex double));
01844   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(out)
01845   plan = fftw_plan_dft_r2c_1d(2*L, in_real, out, FFTW_MEASURE);
01846   for (t=0; t<=L; t++) {
01847     memcpy(in_real, &f[t*f_stride], f_stride*sizeof(double));
01848         fftw_execute_dft_r2c(plan, in_real, out);
01849     for(m=0; m<=L; m++) 
01850       Fmt[m*Fmt_stride + t] = out[m]; 
01851   }
01852   free(in_real);
01853   free(out);
01854   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
01855 
01856   // Apply adjoint of periodic extension.
01857   for (m=0; m<=L; m++) 
01858     for (t=L+1; t<=2*L-1; t++) 
01859       Fmt[m*Fmt_stride + t] = 0.0;
01860 
01861   // Compute Fourier transform over theta, i.e. compute Fmm.
01862   // Note that m and mm indices are increased in size by one.
01863   Fmm = (complex double*)calloc((2*L)*(L+1), sizeof(complex double));
01864   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmm)
01865   Fmm_stride = L+1;
01866   Fmm_offset = L-1;
01867   inout = (complex double*)calloc(2*L, sizeof(complex double));
01868   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout)
01869   plan = fftw_plan_dft_1d(2*L, inout, inout, FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
01870   for (m=0; m<=L; m++) {
01871     memcpy(inout, &Fmt[m*Fmt_stride], Fmt_stride*sizeof(complex double));
01872     fftw_execute_dft(plan, inout, inout);
01873     for(mm=0; mm<=L; mm++) 
01874       Fmm[(mm+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m] = 
01875         inout[mm]; 
01876     for(mm=-(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++) 
01877       Fmm[(mm+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m] =
01878         inout[mm+2*L-1+1]; 
01879   }
01880   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
01881   free(inout);
01882 
01883   // Compute flm.
01884   dl = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
01885   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl)
01886   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO) {
01887     dl8 = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED);
01888     SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl8)
01889   }
01890   dl_offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
01891   dl_stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER); 
01892   inds_offset = 0;
01893   for (el=0; el<=L-1; el++) {
01894     for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
01895       ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind, el, m);
01896       flm[ind] = 0.0;
01897     }
01898   }
01899   for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) {
01900 
01901     // Compute Wigner plane.
01902     switch (dl_method) {
01903 
01904       case SSHT_DL_RISBO:
01905         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
01906           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
01907             ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
01908                                             SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
01909                                             eltmp, sqrt_tbl, signs);
01910           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
01911                                                        dl8, L,
01912                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01913                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
01914                                                        el, 
01915                                                        signs);
01916         }
01917         else {
01918           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
01919                                           SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
01920                                           el, sqrt_tbl, signs);
01921           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
01922                                                        dl8, L,
01923                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01924                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
01925                                                        el, 
01926                                                        signs);
01927         }
01928         break;
01929   
01930       case SSHT_DL_TRAPANI:
01931         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
01932           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
01933             ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
01934                                                 SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01935                                                 eltmp, sqrt_tbl);
01936           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
01937                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01938                                                            el, signs);
01939         }
01940         else {
01941           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
01942                                               SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01943                                               el, sqrt_tbl);
01944           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
01945                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01946                                                            el, signs);  
01947         }
01948         break;
01949 
01950       default:
01951         SSHT_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid dl method") 
01952     }
01953 
01954     // Compute flm.
01955     elfactor = sqrt((double)(2.0*el+1.0)/(4.0*SSHT_PI));
01956     el2pel = el *el + el;    
01957     for (m=0; m<=el; m++)
01958       inds[m + inds_offset] = el2pel + m; 
01959     elssign = spin <= 0 ? 1.0 : signs[el];
01960 
01961     for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
01962       // mm = 0
01963       ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
01964       flm[ind] +=
01965         ssign 
01966         * elfactor
01967         * expsm[m]
01968         * dl[0*dl_stride + m + dl_offset]
01969         * elssign * dl[0*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
01970         * Fmm[(0+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m];
01971     }
01972 
01973     for (mm=1; mm<=el; mm++) {
01974       elmmsign = signs[el] * signs[mm];
01975       elssign = spin <= 0 ? 1.0 : elmmsign;
01976 
01977       for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
01978         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
01979         flm[ind] +=
01980           ssign 
01981           * elfactor
01982           * expsm[m]
01983           * dl[mm*dl_stride + m + dl_offset]
01984           * elssign * dl[mm*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
01985           * ( Fmm[(mm+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m]
01986               + signs[m] * ssign
01987               * Fmm[(-mm+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m]);
01988       }
01989 
01990     }  
01991 
01992   }
01993 
01994   // Set flm values for negative m using conjugate symmetry.
01995   for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) {
01996     for (m=1; m<=el; m++) {
01997       ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind, el, m);
01998       ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind_nm, el, -m);
01999       flm[ind_nm] = signs[m] * conj(flm[ind]);
02000     }
02001   }
02002 
02003   // Free memory.
02004   free(dl);
02005   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO)
02006     free(dl8);
02007   free(Fmt);
02008   free(Fmm);
02009   free(sqrt_tbl);
02010   free(signs); 
02011   free(expsm);
02012   free(inds);
02013 
02014   // Print finished if verbosity set.
02015   if (verbosity > 0) 
02016     printf("%s%s", SSHT_PROMPT, "Adjoint inverse transform computed!");  
02017 
02018 }
02019 
02020 
02037 void ssht_adjoint_mw_forward_sov_sym_ss(complex double *f, complex double *flm,
02038                                         int L, int spin,
02039                                         ssht_dl_method_t dl_method,
02040                                         int verbosity) {
02041 
02042   int el, m, mm, ind;
02043   int eltmp;
02044   double *sqrt_tbl, *signs;
02045   int el2pel, inds_offset;
02046   int *inds;
02047   double ssign, elfactor;
02048   double *dl;
02049   double *dl8 = NULL;
02050   int dl_offset, dl_stride;
02051   complex double *exps;
02052   int exps_offset;
02053   double elmmsign, elssign;
02054   int spinneg;
02055   complex double *Fmm;
02056   int Fmm_offset, Fmm_stride;
02057 
02058   fftw_plan plan, plan_bwd, plan_fwd;
02059   complex double *Ftm, *Gmm;
02060   complex double *w, *wr;
02061   int w_offset;
02062   complex double *Fmm_pad, *tmp_pad;
02063   int f_stride, Ftm_stride, Ftm_offset;
02064   int r, t, p;
02065   complex double *inout;
02066 
02067   int Gmm_offset, Gmm_stride;
02068 
02069   // Allocate memory.
02070   sqrt_tbl = (double*)calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(double));
02071   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl)
02072   signs = (double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(double));
02073   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(signs)
02074   exps = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
02075   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(exps)
02076   inds = (int*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(int));
02077   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inds)
02078 
02079   // Perform precomputations.
02080   for (el=0; el<=2*(L-1)+1; el++)
02081     sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
02082   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m=m+2) {
02083     signs[m]   =  1.0;
02084     signs[m+1] = -1.0;
02085   }
02086   ssign = signs[abs(spin)];
02087   spinneg = spin <= 0 ? spin : -spin;
02088   exps_offset = L-1;
02089   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++)
02090     exps[m + exps_offset] = cexp(-I*SSHT_PION2*(m+spin));
02091 
02092   // Print messages depending on verbosity level.
02093   if (verbosity > 0) {
02094     printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT,
02095            "Computing adjoint forward transform using MW symmetric sampling with ");
02096     printf("%s%s%d%s%d%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, "parameters  (L,spin,reality) = (",
02097            L, ",", spin, ", FALSE)");
02098     if (verbosity > 1)
02099       printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT,
02100              "Using routine ssht_adjoint_mw_forward_sov_sym_ss...");
02101   }
02102 
02103   // Compute Fmm.
02104   Fmm = (complex double*)calloc((2*L-1)*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
02105   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmm)
02106   Fmm_offset = L-1;
02107   Fmm_stride = 2*L-1;
02108   dl = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
02109   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl)
02110   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO) {
02111     dl8 = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED);
02112     SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl8)
02113   }
02114   dl_offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
02115   dl_stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
02116   inds_offset = L-1;
02117   for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) {
02118 
02119     // Compute Wigner plane.
02120     switch (dl_method) {
02121 
02122       case SSHT_DL_RISBO:
02123         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
02124           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
02125             ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L,
02126                                             SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
02127                                             eltmp, sqrt_tbl, signs);
02128           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl,
02129                                                        dl8, L,
02130                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02131                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
02132                                                        el,
02133                                                        signs);
02134         }
02135         else {
02136           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L,
02137                                           SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
02138                                           el, sqrt_tbl, signs);
02139           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl,
02140                                                        dl8, L,
02141                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02142                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
02143                                                        el,
02144                                                        signs);
02145         }
02146         break;
02147   
02148       case SSHT_DL_TRAPANI:
02149         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
02150           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
02151             ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
02152                                                 SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02153                                                 eltmp, sqrt_tbl);
02154           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
02155                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02156                                                            el, signs);
02157         }
02158         else {
02159           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
02160                                               SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02161                                               el, sqrt_tbl);
02162           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
02163                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02164                                                            el, signs);
02165         }
02166         break;
02167 
02168       default:
02169         SSHT_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid dl method")
02170     }
02171 
02172     // Compute Fmm.
02173     elfactor = sqrt((double)(2.0*el+1.0)/(4.0*SSHT_PI));
02174     el2pel = el *el + el;
02175     for (m=-el; m<=el; m++)
02176       inds[m + inds_offset] = el2pel + m;
02177     for (mm=0; mm<=el; mm++) {
02178       elmmsign = signs[el] * signs[mm];
02179       elssign = spin <= 0 ? 1.0 : elmmsign;
02180 
02181       for (m=-el; m<=-1; m++) {
02182         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
02183         Fmm[(m + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset] +=
02184           ssign
02185           * elfactor
02186           * exps[m + exps_offset]
02187           * elmmsign * dl[mm*dl_stride - m + dl_offset]
02188           * elssign * dl[mm*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
02189           * flm[ind];
02190       }
02191       for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
02192         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
02193         Fmm[(m + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset] +=
02194           ssign
02195           * elfactor
02196           * exps[m + exps_offset]
02197           * dl[mm*dl_stride + m + dl_offset]
02198           * elssign * dl[mm*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
02199           * flm[ind];
02200       }
02201
