02202     }
02203 
02204   }
02205 
02206   // Free dl memory.
02207   free(dl);
02208   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO)
02209     free(dl8);
02210 
02211   // Use symmetry to compute Fmm for negative mm.
02212   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++)
02213     for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
02214       Fmm[(m + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset] =
02215         signs[abs(m)] * ssign
02216         * Fmm[(m + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride - mm + Fmm_offset];
02217 
02218   // Compute weights.
02219   w = (double complex*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
02220   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(w)
02221   w_offset = 2*(L-1);
02222   for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=2*(L-1); mm++)
02223     w[mm+w_offset] = ssht_sampling_weight_mw(mm);
02224 
02225   // Compute IFFT of w to give wr.
02226   wr = (double complex*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
02227   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(wr)
02228   inout = (complex double*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
02229   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout)
02230   plan_bwd = fftw_plan_dft_1d(4*L-3, inout, inout, FFTW_BACKWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
02231   plan_fwd = fftw_plan_dft_1d(4*L-3, inout, inout, FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
02232   for (mm=1; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
02233     inout[mm + w_offset] = w[mm - 2*(L-1) - 1 + w_offset];
02234   for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=0; mm++)
02235     inout[mm + w_offset] = w[mm + 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02236   fftw_execute_dft(plan_bwd, inout, inout);
02237   for (mm=0; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
02238     wr[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm - 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02239   for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
02240     wr[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm + 2*(L-1) + 1 + w_offset];
02241 
02242   // Compute Gmm by convolution implemented as product in real space.
02243   Fmm_pad = (complex double*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
02244   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmm_pad)
02245   tmp_pad = (complex double*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
02246   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(tmp_pad)
02247   Gmm = (complex double*)calloc((2*L)*(2*L), sizeof(complex double));
02248   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Gmm)
02249   Gmm_stride = 2*L;
02250   Gmm_offset = L-1;
02251   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++) {
02252 
02253     // Zero-pad Fmm.
02254     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-L; mm++)
02255       Fmm_pad[mm+w_offset] = 0.0;
02256     for (mm=L; mm<=2*(L-1); mm++)
02257       Fmm_pad[mm+w_offset] = 0.0;
02258     for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++)
02259       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] =
02260         Fmm[(m+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset];
02261 
02262     // Compute IFFT of Fmm.
02263     for (mm=1; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
02264       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm - 2*(L-1) - 1 + w_offset];
02265     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=0; mm++)
02266       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm + 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02267     fftw_execute_dft(plan_bwd, inout, inout);
02268     for (mm=0; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
02269       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm - 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02270     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
02271       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm + 2*(L-1) + 1 + w_offset];
02272 
02273     // Compute product of Fmm and weight in real space.
02274     for (r=-2*(L-1); r<=2*(L-1); r++)
02275       Fmm_pad[r + w_offset] *= wr[-r + w_offset];
02276 
02277     // Compute Gmm by FFT.
02278     for (mm=1; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
02279       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm - 2*(L-1) - 1 + w_offset];
02280     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=0; mm++)
02281       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm + 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02282     fftw_execute_dft(plan_fwd, inout, inout);
02283     for (mm=0; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
02284       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm - 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02285     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
02286       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm + 2*(L-1) + 1 + w_offset];
02287 
02288     // Extract section of Gmm of interest.
02289     for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++)
02290       Gmm[(m+Gmm_offset)*Gmm_stride + mm + Gmm_offset] =
02291         Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] * 2.0 * SSHT_PI / (4.0*L-3.0);
02292 
02293   }
02294   fftw_destroy_plan(plan_bwd);
02295   fftw_destroy_plan(plan_fwd);
02296   free(inout);
02297 
02298   // Compute Fourier transform over theta.
02299   inout = (complex double*)calloc(2*L, sizeof(complex double));
02300   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout)
02301   plan = fftw_plan_dft_1d(2*L, inout, inout, FFTW_BACKWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
02302   Ftm = (complex double*)calloc((2*L)*(2*L), sizeof(complex double));
02303   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Ftm)
02304   Ftm_stride = 2*L;
02305   Ftm_offset = L-1;
02306   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L; m++) {
02307 
02308     for(mm=0; mm<=L; mm++)
02309       inout[mm] = Gmm[(m+Gmm_offset)*Gmm_stride + mm + Gmm_offset];
02310     for(mm=-(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
02311       inout[mm+2*L-1+1] = Gmm[(m+Gmm_offset)*Gmm_stride + mm + Gmm_offset];
02312     fftw_execute_dft(plan, inout, inout);
02313 
02314     for(t=0; t<=2*L-1; t++)
02315       Ftm[t*Ftm_stride + m + Ftm_offset] = inout[t] / (2.0*L);
02316 
02317   }
02318 
02319   // Adjoint of periodic extension of Ftm.
02320   for(t=1; t<=L-1; t++)
02321     for (m=-(L-1); m<=L; m++)
02322       Ftm[t*Ftm_stride + m + Ftm_offset] = 
02323         Ftm[t*Ftm_stride + m + Ftm_offset] 
02324         + signs[abs(m)] * ssign * Ftm[(2*L-t)*Ftm_stride + m + Ftm_offset];
02325 
02326   // Compute Fourier transform over phi.
02327   f_stride = 2*L;
02328   for(t=0; t<=L; t++) {
02329 
02330     for(m=0; m<=L; m++)
02331       inout[m] = Ftm[t*Ftm_stride + m + Ftm_offset];
02332     for(m=-(L-1); m<=-1; m++)
02333       inout[m+2*L-1+1] = Ftm[t*Ftm_stride + m + Ftm_offset];
02334     fftw_execute_dft(plan, inout, inout);
02335 
02336     for(p=0; p<=2*L-1; p++)
02337       f[t*f_stride + p] = inout[p] / (2.0*L);
02338 
02339   }
02340   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
02341   free(inout);
02342 
02343   // Free memory.
02344   free(Fmm);
02345   free(Ftm);
02346   free(w);
02347   free(wr);
02348   free(Fmm_pad);
02349   free(tmp_pad);
02350   free(Gmm);
02351 
02352   // Free precomputation memory.
02353   free(sqrt_tbl);
02354   free(signs);
02355   free(exps);
02356   free(inds);
02357 
02358   // Print finished if verbosity set.
02359   if (verbosity > 0)
02360     printf("%s%s", SSHT_PROMPT, "Adjoint forward transform computed!");
02361 
02362 }
02363 
02364 
02381 void ssht_adjoint_mw_forward_sov_sym_ss_real(double *f, 
02382                                              complex double *flm,
02383                                              int L,
02384                                              ssht_dl_method_t dl_method,
02385                                              int verbosity) {
02386 
02387   int el, m, mm, ind;
02388   int eltmp;
02389   double *sqrt_tbl, *signs;
02390   int el2pel, inds_offset;
02391   int *inds;
02392   double ssign, elfactor;
02393   double *dl;
02394   double *dl8 = NULL;
02395   int dl_offset, dl_stride;
02396   complex double *exps;
02397   int exps_offset;
02398   double elmmsign, elssign;
02399   int spinneg;
02400   complex double *Fmm;
02401   int Fmm_offset, Fmm_stride;
02402 
02403   fftw_plan plan, plan_bwd, plan_fwd;
02404   complex double *Ftm, *Gmm;
02405   complex double *w, *wr;
02406   int w_offset;
02407   complex double *Fmm_pad, *tmp_pad;
02408   int f_stride, Ftm_stride;
02409   int r, t, p;
02410   complex double *inout;
02411   complex double *in;
02412   double *out_real;
02413   int Gmm_offset, Gmm_stride;
02414   int spin = 0;
02415 
02416   // Allocate memory.
02417   sqrt_tbl = (double*)calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(double));
02418   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl)
02419   signs = (double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(double));
02420   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(signs)
02421   exps = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
02422   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(exps)
02423   inds = (int*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(int));
02424   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inds)
02425 
02426   // Perform precomputations.
02427   for (el=0; el<=2*(L-1)+1; el++)
02428     sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
02429   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m=m+2) {
02430     signs[m]   =  1.0;
02431     signs[m+1] = -1.0;
02432   }
02433   ssign = signs[abs(spin)];
02434   spinneg = spin <= 0 ? spin : -spin;
02435   exps_offset = L-1;
02436   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++)
02437     exps[m + exps_offset] = cexp(-I*SSHT_PION2*(m+spin));
02438 
02439   // Print messages depending on verbosity level.
02440   if (verbosity > 0) {
02441     printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT,
02442            "Computing adjoint forward transform using MW symmetric sampling with ");
02443     printf("%s%s%d%s%d%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, "parameters  (L,spin,reality) = (",
02444            L, ",", spin, ", FALSE)");
02445     if (verbosity > 1)
02446       printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT,
02447              "Using routine ssht_adjoint_mw_forward_sov_sym_ss_real...");
02448   }
02449 
02450   // Compute Fmm.
02451   Fmm = (complex double*)calloc(L*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
02452   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmm)
02453   Fmm_offset = L-1;
02454   Fmm_stride = 2*L-1;    
02455   dl = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
02456   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl)
02457   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO) {
02458     dl8 = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED);
02459     SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl8)
02460   }
02461   dl_offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
02462   dl_stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);   
02463   inds_offset = L-1;
02464   for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) {
02465 
02466     // Compute Wigner plane.
02467     switch (dl_method) {
02468 
02469       case SSHT_DL_RISBO:
02470         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
02471           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
02472             ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
02473                                             SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
02474                                             eltmp, sqrt_tbl, signs);
02475           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
02476                                                        dl8, L,
02477                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02478                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
02479                                                        el, 
02480                                                        signs);
02481         }
02482         else {
02483           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
02484                                           SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
02485                                           el, sqrt_tbl, signs);
02486           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
02487                                                        dl8, L,
02488                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02489                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
02490                                                        el, 
02491                                                        signs);
02492         }
02493         break;
02494   
02495       case SSHT_DL_TRAPANI:
02496         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
02497           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
02498             ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
02499                                                 SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02500                                                 eltmp, sqrt_tbl);
02501           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
02502                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02503                                                            el, signs);
02504         }
02505         else {
02506           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
02507                                               SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02508                                               el, sqrt_tbl);
02509           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
02510                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02511                                                            el, signs);  
02512         }
02513         break;
02514 
02515       default:
02516         SSHT_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid dl method") 
02517     }
02518 
02519     // Compute Fmm.
02520     elfactor = sqrt((double)(2.0*el+1.0)/(4.0*SSHT_PI));
02521     el2pel = el *el + el;    
02522     for (m=0; m<=el; m++)
02523       inds[m + inds_offset] = el2pel + m; 
02524     for (mm=0; mm<=el; mm++) {
02525       elmmsign = signs[el] * signs[mm];
02526       elssign = spin <= 0 ? 1.0 : elmmsign;
02527 
02528       for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
02529         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
02530         Fmm[m*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset] +=
02531           ssign
02532           * elfactor
02533           * exps[m + exps_offset]         
02534           * dl[mm*dl_stride + m + dl_offset]
02535           * elssign * dl[mm*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
02536           * flm[ind];
02537       }
02538 
02539     }
02540 
02541   }
02542 
02543   // Free dl memory.
02544   free(dl);
02545   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO)
02546     free(dl8);
02547 
02548   // Use symmetry to compute Fmm for negative mm.
02549   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++) 
02550     for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++) 
02551       Fmm[m*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset] =      
02552         signs[abs(m)] * ssign 
02553         * Fmm[m*Fmm_stride - mm + Fmm_offset];
02554 
02555   // Compute weights.
02556   w = (double complex*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
02557   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(w)
02558   w_offset = 2*(L-1);
02559   for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=2*(L-1); mm++)
02560     w[mm+w_offset] = ssht_sampling_weight_mw(mm);
02561 
02562   // Compute IFFT of w to give wr.
02563   wr = (double complex*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
02564   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(wr)
02565   inout = (complex double*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
02566   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout)
02567   plan_bwd = fftw_plan_dft_1d(4*L-3, inout, inout, FFTW_BACKWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
02568   plan_fwd = fftw_plan_dft_1d(4*L-3, inout, inout, FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
02569   for (mm=1; mm<=2*L-2; mm++) 
02570     inout[mm + w_offset] = w[mm - 2*(L-1) - 1 + w_offset];
02571   for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=0; mm++) 
02572     inout[mm + w_offset] = w[mm + 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02573   fftw_execute_dft(plan_bwd, inout, inout);
02574   for (mm=0; mm<=2*L-2; mm++) 
02575     wr[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm - 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02576   for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++) 
02577     wr[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm + 2*(L-1) + 1 + w_offset];
02578 
02579   // Compute Gmm by convolution implemented as product in real space.
02580   Fmm_pad = (complex double*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
02581   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmm_pad)
02582   tmp_pad = (complex double*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
02583   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(tmp_pad)
02584   Gmm = (complex double*)calloc((L+1)*(2*L), sizeof(complex double));
02585   Gmm_stride = 2*L;
02586   Gmm_offset = L-1;
02587   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Gmm)
02588   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++) {
02589 
02590     // Zero-pad Fmm.
02591     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-L; mm++)
02592       Fmm_pad[mm+w_offset] = 0.0;
02593     for (mm=L; mm<=2*(L-1); mm++)
02594       Fmm_pad[mm+w_offset] = 0.0;
02595     for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++)
02596       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = 
02597         Fmm[m*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset];
02598 
02599     // Compute IFFT of Fmm.
02600     for (mm=1; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
02601       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm - 2*(L-1) - 1 + w_offset];
02602     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=0; mm++)
02603       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm + 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02604     fftw_execute_dft(plan_bwd, inout, inout);
02605     for (mm=0; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
02606       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm - 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02607     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
02608       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm + 2*(L-1) + 1 + w_offset];
02609 
02610     // Compute product of Fmm and weight in real space.
02611     for (r=-2*(L-1); r<=2*(L-1); r++) 
02612       Fmm_pad[r + w_offset] *= wr[-r + w_offset];
02613 
02614     // Compute Gmm by FFT.
02615     for (mm=1; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
02616       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm - 2*(L-1) - 1 + w_offset];
02617     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=0; mm++)
02618       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm + 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02619     fftw_execute_dft(plan_fwd, inout, inout);
02620     for (mm=0; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
02621       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm - 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02622     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
02623       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm + 2*(L-1) + 1 + w_offset];
02624 
02625     // Extract section of Gmm of interest.
02626     for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++)
02627       Gmm[m*Gmm_stride + mm + Gmm_offset] = 
02628         Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] * 2.0 * SSHT_PI / (4.0*L-3.0);
02629 
02630   }
02631   fftw_destroy_plan(plan_bwd);
02632   fftw_destroy_plan(plan_fwd);
02633   free(inout);
02634   
02635   // Compute Fourier transform over theta.
02636   inout = (complex double*)calloc(2*L, sizeof(complex double));
02637   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout)
02638   plan = fftw_plan_dft_1d(2*L, inout, inout, FFTW_BACKWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
02639   Ftm = (complex double*)calloc((2*L)*(L+1), sizeof(complex double));
02640   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Ftm)
02641   Ftm_stride = L+1;
02642   for (m=0; m<=L; m++) {
02643 
02644     for(mm=0; mm<=L; mm++)
02645       inout[mm] = Gmm[m*Gmm_stride + mm + Gmm_offset];
02646     for(mm=-(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
02647       inout[mm+2*L-1+1] = Gmm[m*Gmm_stride + mm + Gmm_offset];
02648     fftw_execute_dft(plan, inout, inout);
02649 
02650     for(t=0; t<=2*L-1; t++)
02651       Ftm[t*Ftm_stride + m] = inout[t] / (2.0*L);
02652 
02653   }
02654   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
02655   free(inout);
02656 
02657   // Adjoint of periodic extension of Ftm.
02658   for(t=1; t<=L-1; t++)
02659     for (m=0; m<=L; m++)
02660       Ftm[t*Ftm_stride + m] =
02661         Ftm[t*Ftm_stride + m]
02662         + signs[abs(m)] * ssign * Ftm[(2*L-t)*Ftm_stride + m];
02663 
02664   // Compute Fourier transform over phi.
02665   out_real = (double*)calloc(2*L, sizeof(double));
02666   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(out_real)
02667   in = (complex double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(complex double));
02668   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(in)
02669   plan = fftw_plan_dft_c2r_1d(2*L, in, out_real, FFTW_MEASURE);
02670   f_stride = 2*L;
02671   for(t=0; t<=L; t++) {
02672     
02673     memcpy(in, &Ftm[t*Ftm_stride], Ftm_stride*sizeof(complex double));
02674     fftw_execute_dft_c2r(plan, in, out_real);
02675 
02676     for(p=0; p<=2*L-1; p++)
02677       f[t*f_stride + p] = out_real[p] / (2.0*L);
02678 
02679   }
02680   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
02681   free(out_real);
02682   free(in);
02683 
02684   // Free memory.
02685   free(Fmm);
02686   free(Ftm);
02687   free(w);
02688   free(wr);
02689   free(Fmm_pad);
02690   free(tmp_pad);
02691   free(Gmm);
02692 
02693   // Free precomputation memory.
02694   free(sqrt_tbl);
02695   free(signs);
02696   free(exps);
02697   free(inds);
02698 
02699   // Print finished if verbosity set.
02700   if (verbosity > 0)
02701     printf("%s%s", SSHT_PROMPT, "Adjoint forward transform computed!");
02702 
02703 }
02704 
02705 
02706 //============================================================================
02707 // MW SS Noth-South pole interfaces
02708 //============================================================================
02709 
02710 
02734 void ssht_adjoint_mw_forward_sov_sym_ss_pole(complex double *f, 
02735                                              complex double *f_np, double *phi_np,
02736                                              complex double *f_sp, double *phi_sp,
02737                                              complex double *flm, 
02738                                              int L, int spin, 
02739                                              ssht_dl_method_t dl_method,
02740                                              int verbosity) {
02741 
02742   complex double* f_full;
02743   int t, f_stride = 2*L;
02744 
02745   // Allocate full array.
02746   f_full = (complex double*)calloc((L+1)*(2*L), sizeof(complex double));
02747   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_full)
02748 
02749   // Perform inverse transform.
02750   ssht_adjoint_mw_forward_sov_sym_ss(f_full, flm, L, spin, 
02751                                      dl_method, verbosity);       
02752 
02753   // Copy output function values, including separate points for  poles.
02754  for (t=1; t<=L-1; t++)
02755    memcpy(&f[(t-1)*f_stride], &f_full[t*f_stride], 
02756           (2*L)*sizeof(complex double));
02757   *f_np = f_full[0];
02758   *phi_np = ssht_sampling_mw_ss_p2phi(0, L);
02759   *f_sp = f_full[L*f_stride + 0];
02760   *phi_sp = ssht_sampling_mw_ss_p2phi(0, L);
02761         
02762   // Free memory.
02763   free(f_full);
02764 
02765 }
02766 
02767 
02786 void ssht_adjoint_mw_forward_sov_sym_ss_real_pole(double *f, 
02787                                                   double *f_np,
02788                                                   double *f_sp,
02789                                                   complex double *flm, 
02790                                                   int L, 
02791                                                   ssht_dl_method_t dl_method,
02792                                                   int verbosity) {
02793 
02794   double *f_full;
02795   int t, f_stride = 2*L;
02796 
02797   // Allocate full array.
02798   f_full = (double*)calloc((L+1)*(2*L), sizeof(double));
02799   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_full)
02800 
02801   // Perform inverse transform.
02802   ssht_adjoint_mw_forward_sov_sym_ss_real(f_full, flm, L, 
02803                                           dl_method, verbosity);
02804 
02805   // Copy output function values, including separate points for  poles.
02806   for (t=1; t<=L-1; t++)
02807    memcpy(&f[(t-1)*f_stride], &f_full[t*f_stride], 
02808           (2*L)*sizeof(double));
02809   *f_np = f_full[0];
02810   *f_sp = f_full[L*f_stride + 0];
02811 
02812   // Free memory.
02813   free(f_full);
02814 
02815 }
02816 
02817 
02841 void ssht_adjoint_mw_inverse_sov_sym_ss_pole(complex double *flm, complex double *f,
02842                                              complex double f_np, double phi_np,
02843                                              complex double f_sp, double phi_sp,
02844                                              int L, int spin, 
02845                                              ssht_dl_method_t dl_method,
02846                                              int verbosity) {
02847 
02848   complex double *f_full;
02849   int t, p, f_stride = 2*L;
02850   double phi;
02851 
02852   // Copy function values to full array.
02853   f_full = (complex double*)calloc((L+1)*(2*L), sizeof(complex double));
02854   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_full)
02855   for (t=1; t<=L-1; t++)
02856     memcpy(&f_full[t*f_stride], &f[(t-1)*f_stride], 
02857            (2*L)*sizeof(complex double));
02858 
02859   // Define poles for all phi.
02860   for (p=0; p<=2*L-1; p++) {
02861     phi = ssht_sampling_mw_ss_p2phi(p, L);
02862     f_full[0*f_stride + p] = f_np * cexp(-I*spin*(phi-phi_np)); 
02863     f_full[L*f_stride + p] = f_sp * cexp(I*spin*(phi-phi_sp)); 
02864   }
02865 
02866   // Perform forward transform.
02867   ssht_adjoint_mw_inverse_sov_sym_ss(flm, f_full, L, spin, 
02868                                      dl_method, verbosity);
02869 
02870   // Free memory.
02871   free(f_full);
02872 
02873 }
02874 
02875 
02894 void ssht_adjoint_mw_inverse_sov_sym_ss_real_pole(complex double *flm, 
02895                                                   double *f, 
02896                                                   double f_np,
02897                                                   double f_sp,
02898                                                   int L, 
02899                                                   ssht_dl_method_t dl_method,
02900                                                   int verbosity) {
02901 
02902   double *f_full;
02903   int t, p, f_stride = 2*L;
02904 
02905   // Copy function values to full array.
02906   f_full = (double*)calloc((L+1)*(2*L), sizeof(double));
02907   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_full)
02908   for (t=1; t<=L-1; t++)
02909     memcpy(&f_full[t*f_stride], &f[(t-1)*f_stride], 
02910            (2*L)*sizeof(double));
02911 
02912   // Define poles for all phi.
02913   for (p=0; p<=2*L-1; p++) {
02914     f_full[0*f_stride + p] = f_np; 
02915     f_full[L*f_stride + p] = f_sp; 
02916   }
02917 
02918   // Perform forward transform.
02919   ssht_adjoint_mw_inverse_sov_sym_ss_real(flm, f_full, L, 
02920                                           dl_method, verbosity);
02921 
02922   // Free memory.
02923   free(f_full);
02924 
02925 }
